WorkItem.Description:
I have attached a jpg image showing the issue I am having with teh Start Page.  The clickable links extend beyond their boundaries.  The tab section is repeated.  The Title is repeated again at the bottom of the page.  I am also having boundary issues on other pages as well.  At first I thought it was an issue with my .net framework installation.  I have uninstalled and then reinstalled all needed versions and patches to no avail.  Has anyone else seen this issue?
Â 
Thanks!
~MattS
WorkItem.Summary: Display Issue with Rawr Start page

Comments.Message: Control Panels > Display Properties > Advanced > DPI > Set that to Normal
That did the trick!  I checked some of the other font settings, but missed that one.  Thanks!
